name: texter
releasenote:
The next big thing for texter - Markdown! 

 texter can now also handle markdown for various frameworks, and also bundles its own basic interpreter to build your own style on top of it.
 for more things see CHANGELOG.md
description: adding more support for general text input, regular text, markdown text and more in multiple libraries such as HaxeFlixel, OpenFL and more (to be added!)
